data.name: Dance Dash
data.description:
Stomp the beats in this pulse-pounding, full body sensory symphony. Craft your own rhythm, groove to community maps and mods.

Pair with Meta Quest controller Trackstraps to unleash the Dance Dasher within you. Fully functional on Quest 2 or Quest Pro, currently in Alpha for Quest 3 tracking. 

üîäCOMMUNITY BEATMAPS AND MUSIC IN-GAMEüéµ

A true rhythm game open platform, inside your Quest headset directly download custom songs, charts, mods and more, get creative and drop your own beats with our free beatmap editor!

ü¶∂üèªSTOMP THE BEATS, DO THE SHUFFLEüëü

Harness gravity-powered shoes to hover above the dance floor, commanding the beats with a stomp. Slide to rhythm and shuffle, shuffle, shuffle!

üíÉDUCK, DODGE, JUMPüï∫

Finally JUMP like you mean it in VR! So stay alert and nimble, with some quick reflexes and sick moves, you can easily overcome any obstacle in your path.

üí´TRACKSTRAP HARDWARE ACCESSORIES‚ú®

Rock to the rhythm with Trackstraps for controllers on feet and groove to the beats by enabling foot tracking with Meta Quest controller Trackstaps. 

üåéUNLEASH THE DANCE DASHER WITHINüåê

Join our growing Discord community of over 1,000 members from countries all over the world: discord.gg/DanceDash

changelog.change_log: Improved performance: The game now runs in 80Hz mode and the framerate is more stable.

- Better Light Animations
- New Floor Effect That Changes With Multiplier Level
- Support Adjusting Shoe Binding Position
- 3 Levels of Play Space Scale Options
- Variouse UI & Visual Fixes
